revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}}
'''[[Classes:Menu|Menu]]'''
native static int '''MenuTime'''()
== Usage == Gets the total number of tics where any menu has been open. This does not track menus individually. 35 tics is 1 second.
=== Return Value === Returns the number of tics.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Menu]]
